ingredients: 8  skinless, boneless chicken thighs, 2 large onions, thinly sliced, 4 large carrots, thinly sliced,   +   1/2 cup raisins,   +   1/2 cup dried apricots, chopped, 2 cups chicken broth, 2 tablespoons tomato paste, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons garlic salt, 2 teaspoons ground cumin, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons ground ginger, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon Hungarian paprika, 1 teaspoon ground black pepper, 3 cups water, 2 cups couscous , 1 tablespoon butter
nutrition: Total Fat 10g 12%, Saturated Fat 3g 16%, Cholesterol 73mg 24%, Sodium 590mg 26%, Total Carbohydrate 57g 21%, Dietary Fiber 5g 19%, Total Sugars 14g, Protein 27g, Vitamin C 8mg 41%, Calcium 64mg 5%, Iron 3mg 16%, Potassium 622mg 13%
